compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data, rights of the data subject

compliant.section: AOT使用這些資訊的最終目的是爲了支援和強化公司與您的關係，例如處理購買事宜，提供服務和支援，與您分享產品、服務以及公司新聞等。
compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data, lawfulness of processing

compliant.section: AOT在任何情況下都不會出售您的個人資訊。
compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data, processing of special categories of personal data

compliant.section: AOT只有在事先徵得您同意的情況下才會依法與AOT外部分享您的個人資訊。
compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing, conditions for consent

compliant.section: AOT可能會與那些幫助AOT履行對您的義務的企業分享資訊，但前提是這些合作夥伴必須承諾保護您的隱私權。
compliant.legal provisions: Joint controllers, processor, transfers subject to appropriate safeguards, supervisory authority

compliant.section: AOT將通過合 適的方法和步驟來努力保護您的個人資料的安全。
compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data, security of processing

non_compliant.section: 一般情況下，您無須提供您的姓名或其他個人資訊即可訪問AOT的網站。但有時AOT可能需要您提供一些資訊以完成特定事務的處理或提供更好的服務，例如為了處理訂單、與您聯繫或處理工作應聘。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Right of access by the data subject, right to rectification
non_compliant.amend: Specify the legal basis for data collection and processing (e.g., contract, consent, legitimate interest) and provide information about data retention periods.

non_compliant.section:
第三方網站
請充分認識到可通過AOT網站訪問的其他網站可能會收集關於您的可識別的個人資訊。鏈結至本網站的其他第三方網站的資訊保護政策不包括在本隱私權聲明之內，AOT不對這些非由AOT管理的網站的隱私權保護負責。 您對密碼或其他任何帳戶資訊的保密性負完全責任。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Transparent information, communication and modalities for the exercise of the rights of the data subject
non_compliant.amend: Provide clear and concise information about the use of cookies and other tracking technologies, including the purpose, legal basis, and options for users to manage their preferences. Offer users a way to access, rectify, or erase their data.
